citations.narrative:
There were 9 dogs with beds that were damaged. The severity of the damaged beds extend from peeled surfaces to torn
surfaces with holes. The beds and other furniture in contact with the animals should be maintained on a regular basis for
the animals well-being. The beds that can't be readily cleaned and sanitized must be replaced when worn and soiled.
Correct by January 1, 2026.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative.
n

narrative:
3.1(c)(2) 
   
Housing facilities, general. 
There were 9 dogs with beds that were damaged. The severity of the damaged beds extend from peeled surfaces to torn 
surfaces with holes. The beds and other furniture in contact with the animals should be maintained on a regular basis for 
the animals well-being. The beds that can't be readily cleaned and sanitized must be replaced when worn and soiled. 
Correct by January 1, 2026. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative. 
 
 n
